pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[GitHub Pages](https://jameskabbes.github.io/pypi_builder)
[PyPI](https://pypi.org/project/kabbes-pypi-builder)# pypi_builderproject for easily deploying code to Python Package Index
# Installation`pip install kabbes_pypi_builder`
# UsageFor more in-depth documentation, read the information provided on the Pages. Or better yet, read the source code.## Python Script```pythonimport pypi_builder as py_build``````pythonpy_build.generate```## Terminal```python -m pypi_builder```
# AuthorJames Kabbes
